titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [6. 3. 1936]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 196; Cambridge Letters, S. 273).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I'm sorry to say I can't see you today as I've got a bl.... cold & must stay indoors.
I hope to see you next Friday.
